componentType.description: This plugin is used for MIDI applications

inputPort.description: this input port triggers the keystroke of the midi plugin
this input selects the pitch of the tone played.
accepts string inputs for instrument names of the active midi device, to select this instrument.
accepts string inputs for filenames of a tonescale, to select this scale.

property.name: midiDevice
property.description: name of the Midi Output device

property.name: channel
property.description: sets the channel for the midi instrument

property.name: instrument
property.description: name of the instrument or controller

property.name: triggerThreshold
property.description: sets the threshold for triggering a note

property.name: triggerMax
property.description: sets the value for the trigger input where the tone will have maximum volume

property.name: pitchMin
property.description: sets the minimum input value for computing the tone pitch

property.name: pitchMax
property.description: sets the maximum input value for computing the tone pitch

property.name: playOnlyChangingNotes
property.description: if selected, only note changes will be played

property.name: displayGUI
property.description: if selected, the GUI window with tone parameters will be shown

property.name: displayNoteNames
property.description: if selected, the note captions will be displayed
